Canine Sky Patrol: A team of highly trained dogs, each equipped with a small parachute, could be deployed for search and rescue missions in remote areas, utilizing their ability to fly.
K9 Flight School: Establishing a specialized flight school to train dogs to fly, providing them with a new skill set and potentially opening up new career opportunities.
Dog Flight Racing: A new competitive sport where dogs race through the sky, adding an exciting twist to traditional dog racing.
Sky-Dog Tours: Guided aerial tours where dogs fly alongside tourists, offering a unique and thrilling experience.
Dog Flight Therapy: Utilizing the ability to fly as a form of therapy for dogs, helping them overcome fears and build confidence.
